SELECT METHOD_NM AS conectMethod , IFNULL(SUM(CREAT_CO),0) AS creatCo , IFNULL(SUM(UPDT_CO),0) AS updtCo , IFNULL(SUM(RDCNT),0) AS inqireCo , IFNULL(SUM(DELETE_CO),0) AS deleteCo , IFNULL(SUM(OUTPT_CO),0) AS outptCo , IFNULL(SUM(ERROR_CO),0) AS errorCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)) AS statsDate
, 0 AS statsCo FROM COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY WHERE OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate#
AND SVC_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#detailStatsKind#),'%')
GROUP BY conectMethod, statsDate, statsCo ORDER BY statsDate

, SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d'), 1, 4) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d'), 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d'), 5, 2)) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d'), 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d'), 5, 2)), '-'), SUBSTR(DATE_FORMAT(CREAT_DT, '%Y%m%d'), 7, 2)) AS statsDate
, '' AS conectMethod , 0 AS creatCo , 0 AS updtCo , 0 AS inqireCo , 0 AS deleteCo , 0 AS outptCo , 0 AS errorCo FROM COMTNLOGINLOG WHERE CONECT_ID = #detailStatsKind#
